title: Unforgettable Love: BOSS Is Too Fierce - Novel Updates
author: Ye Weishu   叶微舒
description: After the mistake of charm and romance of one night, he couldn’t stop missing her body, and since then he wanted to merge with her nonstop day and night. People say that he was indifferent and fickle but loved her deeply. But she knew from the bottom of her heart that what he really favored was just her body. There was someone in his heart, who was his true love~~~ She got pregnant by accident and begged him to let her at least keep the baby. Yet he said, “Abort it.” She turned her back with a smile, knowing that he loved that woman so much that he could be so cruel to the mother of his baby…… When she disappeared, he suddenly realized that she had been marked deep in his body and became the love of his life!>
